RESTRICTIONS.TITLE: Restrictions
RESTRICTIONS.NONE: No restrictions placed on user account.

ADD.SUCCESS: Successfully placed the restriction set on the user account.

LIFT.CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to lift this restriction set from the user?
LIFT.SUCCESS: Successfully lifted the restriction set from the user.

RESTRICTIONSET.NAME: Restriction Set
